All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Activity
This is activity class which will act as the parent class to event and course allowing the creation for an activity in a schedule
ActivityRecordIO
Writes Activities to file
ActivityRecordIOTest
Tests for ActivityRecordIO.
Course
This Course program will allow the scheduling of different NCSU Course's based on name, title, section, credits, instructor ID, and meeting days.
CourseRecordIO
Reads Course records from text files.
CourseRecordIOTest
Tests CouresRecordIO.
CourseTest
Tests the Course class.
Event
The event class is a sub class of activity, which will allow for more than just courses to be added to ones schedule
EventTest
Tests the Event class.
ExtendedCourseTest
Tests the extended functionality of Course from Guided Project 2.
WolfScheduler
This is the WolfScheduler class which is what allows the user to edit their schedule, from tasks like adding, removing, and getting activities.
WolfSchedulerGUI
GUI for the WolfScheduler project.
WolfSchedulerTest
Tests the WolfScheduler class.
